labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
It unblocks Google IMA (Interactive Media Ads SDK), which is rather related to ads than trackers - [https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/docs/sdks/html5/client-side](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/docs/sdks/html5/client-side) and blocking it sometimes causes some issues, but usually unblocking it doesn't cause that ads are not blocked and trackers still should be blocked.

I will add this rule, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.
Thank you for you reply.

comment.body:
> Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it anymore. Please check if these buttons work correctly if you add this rule:
> 
> ```
> $script,redirect-rule=noopjs,domain=sammobile.com
> ```
> 
> to user rules.
> 
> If website will still not work correctly, then please disable filter lists on by one and check which one causes this issue.
> 
> By the way, I think that it's worth to note that these buttons work after a while (1-5 seconds) when website is fully loaded and the same happens without any ad blocker.

Thank you..it works after I added this rule💙

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.emag.ro/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2F) ### Comment > Hi! Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. This I don't know if it's because of Adguard or not but it just became a problem in the past week, out of the blue. > > Thank you. Have a good day! ### Screenshots

comment.body:
I see! Thank you for explaining that!

On Mon, Sep 19, 2022 at 1:57 PM Adam ***@***.***> wrote:

> For example, it could happens in case if protection was disabled and
> website has been opened.
> Some scripts or other things (like images, videos, just examples) could be
> saved in cache and if protection will be again enabled then some of these
> requests will be not blocked.
> In this case website checks if ad blocker is enabled (by checking if
> ads_script.js script is blocked) and if it detects that ad blocker is not
> enabled, then it displays banners from ad servers, otherwise it displays
> different banners (not from ad servers).
> If this script was saved in cache then website tried to loads banners from
> ad server and that's the reason why those banners were not displayed.

Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. comment.body:
For example, it could happens in case if protection was disabled and website has been opened.
Some scripts or other things (like images, videos, just examples) could be saved in cache and if protection will be again enabled then some of these requests will be not blocked.
In this case website checks if ad blocker is enabled (by checking if `ads_script.js` script is blocked) and if it detects that ad blocker is not enabled, then it displays banners from ad servers, otherwise it displays different banners (not from ad servers).
If this script was saved in cache then website tried to loads banners from ad server and that's the reason why those banners were not displayed.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.44.2 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.masterborn.com/masterui ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Annoyances filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. There is a rule in AdGuard Annoyances that prevents displaying of perfectly valid, user-initiated email forms from Mailerlite. 2. Screenshots
Email submit form with filter enabled: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/147478/190984145-9e4a0eae-096c-4764-b9f0-528672e4bcb3.png)
Problematic filter:
Email submit form after disabling the filter: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/147478/190984427-e1222a70-aa1e-4f86-b535-395755635a25.png)
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.emag.ro
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.emag.ro/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2F) ### Comment > Hi! Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. This I don't know if it's because of Adguard or not but it just became a problem in the past week, out of the blue. > > Thank you. Have a good day! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/8d9w10V.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9v1ISE3.jpg)

comment.body:
That worked. Can you explain why that happened? I don't want to bother you
with small things like this but I want to understand why this happens.
Also, a lot of people don't use that Ctrl + F5 so I this that if they don't
see nothing they will miss on stuff... Again Thank you for your help!

On Mon, Sep 19, 2022 at 1:40 PM Adam ***@***.***> wrote:

deleted the provided rule and let the base filter (that was updated) do the
magic but as of half an hour ago, again the main banner of this digital
shop is not visible when logged in my account. God damn this is frustrating
since again they have special offers that can be accessed only by that
banner...

comment.body:
Hello @dc911x
I didn't notice that you use AdGuard DNS only, sorry.
AdGuard Base filter is in the [AdGuard extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/adguard-adblocker/bgnkhhnnamicmpeenaelnjfhikgbkllg).

If you want to continue using only AdGuard home, please add 
`@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com^`
to custom filterig rules. But this domain wil be unblocked everywhere.

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Unfortunately, we can't reproduce the problem with your settings.

1. Please go to settings > Safari > extensions, disable all AdGuard extensions and enable them again.
2. Go to the AdGuard app and update the filters, wait 2-3 minutes without closing the app.
3. Reboot your device
4. Go to this site and check for ads, there shouldn't be any.

comment.body:
The issue is caused by `AdBlockID` filter list, please add this rules to the User Rules: 
```
dhzy.fun#@#a[target="_blank"][rel*="noreferrer"] > img[src*=".gif"]
dhzy.fun#@#a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
```
or disable this filter. 
@realodix could you please take a look ?
